programme.title: The Fixies

Their son, Maran, meets a group of lovable misfits at school while their rebellious daughter, Mangai, feels alienated being the only human in the family. Join this oddball family in Ayalaan - Out of this World on a whimsical journey of understanding the complex beings that are humans!
